title: GitHub Copilot: A Glimpse into the Future of Development
author: Benjamin G Nechicattu
description: A glimpse into the future of development with GitHub Copilot's automatic pull request creation for my portfolio project.
content:
**GitHub Copilot: A Glimpse into the Future of Development**

In the ever-evolving world of software development, tools that enhance productivity and streamline workflows are invaluable. Recently, I had an experience that underscored the potential of AI in coding: GitHub Copilot's automatic creation of a pull request for my portfolio project. This incident not only showcased the capabilities of AI but also highlighted the seamless integration of Copilot into the development process.

**The Task at Hand**

The task was straightforward: implement a dark theme toggle for my portfolio website. A simple feature, yet essential for user experience. I created an issue on GitHub titled "Dark Theme" and assigned it to Copilot.

**Copilot's Response**

Within moments, Copilot generated a pull request that included:

A new state variable to manage the theme.

A button component to toggle between light and dark modes.

CSS adjustments to reflect the theme changes.

This wasn't just a basic implementation; Copilot's code was clean, efficient, and aligned with best practices. It was as if a seasoned developer had contributed the code.

**The Impact**

This experience was a testament to the advancements in AI-assisted development. Copilot's ability to understand the context of the issue and deliver a solution so promptly was nothing short of impressive. It made me reflect on the future of codingâ€”where AI doesn't just assist but actively participates in the development process.

**Conclusion**

GitHub Copilot has proven to be more than just a code suggestion tool. It's a collaborator, an enabler, and a glimpse into the future of software development. As AI continues to evolve, experiences like this remind us of the exciting possibilities that lie ahead.
